description:
This course is about creating quality content for your social networking platforms like facebook, youtube, twitter and instagram etc. This course can help anyone to create content with no previous skills required at all. We will be using an online platform which will help to create video content within few easy steps.

You can also use these videos as a commercial for youtube marketing. These videos are great alternative for high end video commercials we use for social network video marketing.

I have included working, preview and final rendering of three different kind of templates which includes text, image placeholder, background music etc. All the material is actual working of all the videos with commentary in the background.

This course is only for apprx 30 mins. Most of the course is to the point to help students quickly learn and start creating their own videos.

By the end of this course, you should be able to create 9 different kind of videos within 30 mins or even less. There are other paid templates on this online platform which you can use to create even more content.

I have used these template for my own online business to create one video every alternate day and post it to all my social networks to create curiosity for my potential customers. If you are running a business or have a brand or may be coming up with another product in market, then this course is for you!
title: Create high quality video content within 30 mins.
